column4: does anyone know how to fix a 'segmentation fault' when using iwlist?
not on this computer, it is the same thing. but it uses a PCMCIA wifi card
drivers were fine, and i don't think xFCE4 (xubuntu-desktop) or open office touched them since it worked after i apt-got those
are all the settings in /etc/network/interfaces correct?
looks like iwlist is a bit annoying for other ppl too. (http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/showthread.php?s=&threadid=363456)
thanks for that link! may have try that last script he posted
Obviously make it in english tho ;D
though this confuses me: insmod /lib/modules/2.6.12-11mdkcustom/net/zd1211_mod.ko not sure if ubuntu would take that...
would apt-get install ubuntu-base do a re-install off the CDROM if i had the CD in the drive?
